yauwana katayuthu ha nipunatha sanwardhana amathyanshaye punarawarthana wiyadam sandaha ru. 5,500,000,000k da muladhana wiyadam sandaha ru. 7,000,000,000k da anumatha karaganimata da idikirim, injineru sewa, niwasa ha podu pahasukam amathyanshaye punarawarthana wiyadam sandaha ru. 808,725,000k da muladhana wiyadam sandaha ru. 4,000,000,000k da anumatha karaganimata da aandu pakshaya apeksha karayi. perawaru 10.00 sita paswaru 12.30 dakwa yauwana katayuthu ha nipunatha sanwardhana amathyanshaye 156 ha 215 waya shirshayan wiwadayata ganu labana athara paswaru 1.00 sita idikirim, injineru sewa, niwasa ha podu pahasukam amathyanshaye 123, 309 sita 311 dakwa waya shirshayan da wiwadayata gane.
